order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into weekly (id, tid, tname, sid, sname, IncludePic, systemtime, date, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8, weeks, scoregrade, `describe`, sessionid ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{includepic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{systemtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{p8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weeks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scoregrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
